minecraft:adventure/fall_from_world_heig.actualRequirements: Drop from a point above y-level 319 and land below y-level -59
minecraft:adventure/fall_from_world_heig.description: Free fall from the top of the world (build limit) to the bottom of the world and survive‌

blazeandcave:mining/bottom_to_top.actualRequirements: Place at y-level 319: Stone, Granite, Andesite, Diorite, Gravel, Dirt, Deepslate, Tuff, Moss, Moss Carpet, Clay, Dripstone, Pointed Dripstone, Sculk

blazeandcave:farming/an_apple_a_day.requirements: Eat an Apple every day for 30 in-game days (The day counter increments when the player eats an apple on a day that they haven't eaten an apple yet. If there was, it resets the apple eaten scoreboard, meaning the player will need to eat another apple on this day)
blazeandcave:farming/an_apple_a_day.actualRequirements: The day counter increments when the player eats an apple on a day that they haven't eaten an apple yet. If there was, it resets the apple eaten scoreboard, meaning the player will need to eat another apple on this day

blazeandcave:farming/combine_harvester.name: Combine Harvester
blazeandcave:farming/combine_harvester.requirements:
Use bone meal on everything that can be grown (Use Bone Meal on: Wheat Seeds, Carrots, Potatoes, Beetroot Seeds, Bamboo, Melon Stem, Pumpkin Stem, all six types of Saplings, Sunflowers, Lilacs, Rose Bushes, Peonies, Grass (so it turns into Tall Grass), Fern (so it turns into Large Fern), Seagrass (so it turns into Tall Seagrass), Red Mushroom, Brown Mushroom, Cocoa, Sweet Berry Bush, Sea Pickles, Kelp, Weeping Vines, Twisting Vines, Crimson Fungus, Warped Fungus, Glow Lichen, Small OR Big Dripleaves, Cave Vines, Azalea, Flowering Azalea, Mangrove Propagule, Mangrove Leaves, Rooted Dirt, Cherry Sapling, Torchflower Crop, Pitcher Crop, Pink PetalsBone meal does NOT need to be used on blocks that randomly grow a spread of plants (e.g. Grass, Nylium, Moss, underwater blocks to get Seagrass, etc) 
Known bug: Red Mushrooms, Brown Mushrooms, Azaleas, Flowering Azaleas and Mangrove Propagules only count if you bone-meal them but they don't immediately grow.)
blazeandcave:farming/combine_harvester.actualRequirements:
Use Bone Meal on: Wheat Seeds, Carrots, Potatoes, Beetroot Seeds, Bamboo, Melon Stem, Pumpkin Stem, all six types of Saplings, Sunflowers, Lilacs, Rose Bushes, Peonies, Grass (so it turns into Tall Grass), Fern (so it turns into Large Fern), Seagrass (so it turns into Tall Seagrass), Red Mushroom, Brown Mushroom, Cocoa, Sweet Berry Bush, Sea Pickles, Kelp, Weeping Vines, Twisting Vines, Crimson Fungus, Warped Fungus, Glow Lichen, Small OR Big Dripleaves, Cave Vines, Azalea, Flowering Azalea, Mangrove Propagule, Mangrove Leaves, Rooted Dirt, Cherry Sapling, Torchflower Crop, Pitcher Crop, Pink PetalsBone meal does NOT need to be used on blocks that randomly grow a spread of plants (e.g. Grass, Nylium, Moss, underwater blocks to get Seagrass, etc) 
Known bug: Red Mushrooms, Brown Mushrooms, Azaleas, Flowering Azaleas and Mangrove Propagules only count if you bone-meal them but they don't immediately grow.
blazeandcave:farming/combine_harvester.description: Use bone meal on everything that can be grown

blazeandcave:enchanting/master_armorer.name: Master Armorer
blazeandcave:enchanting/master_armorer.requirements:
Create a full suit of armor with all possible enchantments at max level (Obtain the following items with the following enchantments:
Diamond or Netherite Helmet: Any Protection IV, Unbreaking III, Mending, Aqua Affinity, and Respiration III.
Diamond or Netherite Chestplate: Any Protection IV, Unbreaking III, Mending, and Thorns III.
Diamond or Netherite Leggings: Any Protection IV, Unbreaking III, Mending and Swift Sneak III.
Diamond or Netherite Boots: Any Protection IV, Unbreaking III, Mending, Feather Falling IV, Soul Speed III and either Depth Strider III or Frost Walker II.)
blazeandcave:enchanting/master_armorer.actualRequirements:
Obtain the following items with the following enchantments:
Diamond or Netherite Helmet: Any Protection IV, Unbreaking III, Mending, Aqua Affinity, and Respiration III.
Diamond or Netherite Chestplate: Any Protection IV, Unbreaking III, Mending, and Thorns III.
Diamond or Netherite Leggings: Any Protection IV, Unbreaking III, Mending and Swift Sneak III.
Diamond or Netherite Boots: Any Protection IV, Unbreaking III, Mending, Feather Falling IV, Soul Speed III and either Depth Strider III or Frost Walker II.
blazeandcave:enchanting/master_armorer.description: Create a full suit of armor with all possible enchantments at max level

blazeandcave:enchanting/master_fisher.name: Master Fisher
blazeandcave:enchanting/master_fisher.requirements: Create a fishing rod with all possible enchantments at max level (Obtain a Fishing Rod enchanted with: Lure III, Luck of the Sea III, Unbreaking III and Mending)
blazeandcave:enchanting/master_fisher.actualRequirements: Obtain a Fishing Rod enchanted with: Lure III, Luck of the Sea III, Unbreaking III and Mending
blazeandcave:enchanting/master_fisher.description: Create a fishing rod with all possible enchantments at max level

blazeandcave:enchanting/master_tridentee.requirements: Create a trident with all possible enchantments at max level (Obtain a Trident enchanted with: Impaling V, Unbreaking III, Mending, and then either Riptide III, or Loyalty III and Channeling)
blazeandcave:enchanting/master_tridentee.actualRequirements: Obtain a Trident enchanted with: Impaling V, Unbreaking III, Mending, and then either Riptide III, or Loyalty III and Channeling
blazeandcave:enchanting/master_tridentee.description: Create a trident with all possible enchantments at max level

blazeandcave:enchanting/master_macerator.name: Master Macerator
blazeandcave:enchanting/master_macerator.requirements: Create a mace with all possible enchantments at max level (Obtain a Mace enchanted with: Wind Burst III, Fire Aspect II, Mending, Unbreaking III, and then one of: Density V, Breach IV, Smite V or Bane of Arthropods V)
blazeandcave:enchanting/master_macerator.actualRequirements: Obtain a Mace enchanted with: Wind Burst III, Fire Aspect II, Mending, Unbreaking III, and then one of: Density V, Breach IV, Smite V or Bane of Arthropods V
blazeandcave:enchanting/master_macerator.description: Create a mace with all possible enchantments at max level

blazeandcave:challenges/dragon_vs_dragon.name: Dragon vs Dragon II
blazeandcave:challenges/dragon_vs_dragon.requirements: Defeat the Ender Dragon while wearing a dragon head... without touching the ground (Once the Ender Dragon becomes attackable you must not be touching the ground AND be wearing a Dragon Head for the whole fight, and deal the killing blow. It also resets if you ride any vehicle OR touch water or lava)
blazeandcave:challenges/dragon_vs_dragon.actualRequirements: Once the Ender Dragon becomes attackable you must not be touching the ground AND be wearing a Dragon Head for the whole fight, and deal the killing blow. It also resets if you ride any vehicle OR touch water or lava

blazeandcave:challenges/dragon_vs_wither.name: Dragon vs Wither: Pre-Sequel
blazeandcave:challenges/dragon_vs_wither.requirements: Defeat the Wither while wearing a Dragon head... without touching the ground (Once the Wither becomes attackable you must not be touching the ground AND be wearing a Dragon Head for the whole fight, and deal the killing blow. It also resets if you ride any vehicle OR touch water, lava or a climbable block such as ladders)

It also resets if you ride any vehicle OR touch water, lava or a climbable block such as ladders

blazeandcave:challenges/riddle_me_this.name: Riddle Me This
blazeandcave:challenges/riddle_me_this.requirements: See below for description and walkthrough (as it is very long) (1) Put Curse of Vanishing on a compass, 2) Slay either a Drowned with a fishing rod or a Zombie Villager of fisherman profession 3) Ride a mob named “Dinnerbone” or “Grumm” 4) Inside a Jungle Temple, use shears to disarm a tripwire, then walk over it 5) Have the Invisibility and Glowing effects at the same time 6) Throw an egg at a chicken that is currently in mid-air 7) Give a baby Piglin a gold ingot 8) Kill a Wither with a splash healing potion 9) Use a spyglass while you have a parrot on your shoulder, a map in your other hand, and are riding a boat 10) Place 1000 Warped Buttons (note: It does not start counting until you have completed the ninth line))
blazeandcave:challenges/riddle_me_this.actualRequirements: 1) Put Curse of Vanishing on a compass, 2) Slay either a Drowned with a fishing rod or a Zombie Villager of fisherman profession 3) Ride a mob named “Dinnerbone” or “Grumm” 4) Inside a Jungle Temple, use shears to disarm a tripwire, then walk over it 5) Have the Invisibility and Glowing effects at the same time 6) Throw an egg at a chicken that is currently in mid-air 7) Give a baby Piglin a gold ingot 8) Kill a Wither with a splash healing potion 9) Use a spyglass while you have a parrot on your shoulder, a map in your other hand, and are riding a boat 10) Place 1000 Warped Buttons (note: It does not start counting until you have completed the ninth line)
blazeandcave:challenges/riddle_me_this.description: See below for description and walkthrough (as it is very long)

blazeandcave:biomes/boaty_mcboatface.name: Boaty McBoatface
blazeandcave:biomes/boaty_mcboatface.requirements: Craft and ride a boat to sail on the high seas (Enter a boat or chest boat)
blazeandcave:biomes/boaty_mcboatface.actualRequirements: Enter a boat or chest boat
blazeandcave:biomes/boaty_mcboatface.description: Craft and ride a boat to sail on the high seas

blazeandcave:biomes/dive_bomb.name: Dive Bomb
blazeandcave:biomes/dive_bomb.requirements: Dive into water from a cliff at least 50 blocks tall (Fall at least 50 blocks and land in water)
blazeandcave:biomes/dive_bomb.actualRequirements: Fall at least 50 blocks and land in water
blazeandcave:biomes/dive_bomb.description: Dive into water from a cliff at least 50 blocks tall

blazeandcave:biomes/free_diver.name: Free Diver
blazeandcave:biomes/free_diver.requirements: Stay underwater for 2 minutes (See warning below)

blazeandcave:biomes/sleep_with_the_fishe.name: Sleep with the Fishes
blazeandcave:biomes/sleep_with_the_fishe.requirements:
Spend a day underwater ("Warning: The counter may reset if you pass through or close to certain waterlogged blocks that can be placed out of water such as coral, coral fans, sea pickles, or other manufactured blocks like slab, ladders or trapdoors placed underwater
Waterloggable blocks that cannot be placed out of water (kelp and seagrass) will not cause the counter to reset")
blazeandcave:biomes/sleep_with_the_fishe.actualRequirements:
"Warning: The counter may reset if you pass through or close to certain waterlogged blocks that can be placed out of water such as coral, coral fans, sea pickles, or other manufactured blocks like slab, ladders or trapdoors placed underwater
Waterloggable blocks that cannot be placed out of water (kelp and seagrass) will not cause the counter to reset"

blazeandcave:biomes/cargo_carrier.name: Cargo Carrier
blazeandcave:biomes/cargo_carrier.requirements: Ride a Boat with a Chest in it (Enter a chest boat)
blazeandcave:biomes/cargo_carrier.description: Ride a Boat with a Chest in it

blazeandcave:biomes/flipper.name: Flipper
blazeandcave:biomes/flipper.requirements: Give a Dolphin something to play with (Have a Dolphin nudge an item that you threw)
blazeandcave:biomes/flipper.actualRequirements: Have a Dolphin nudge an item that you threw
blazeandcave:biomes/flipper.description: Give a Dolphin something to play with

blazeandcave:biomes/dolphin_dasher.name: Dolphin Dasher
blazeandcave:biomes/dolphin_dasher.requirements: Get a speed boost from your friendly underwater companions (Get the Dolphin's Grace effect)
blazeandcave:biomes/dolphin_dasher.description: Get a speed boost from your friendly underwater companions

blazeandcave:biomes/so_long_and_thanks_f.name: So Long & Thanks For The Fish

blazeandcave:biomes/the_great_blocky_ree.name: The Great Blocky Reef
blazeandcave:biomes/the_great_blocky_ree.requirements: Come across a coral reef in an ocean (Enter a Warm Ocean biome)
blazeandcave:biomes/the_great_blocky_ree.description: Come across a coral reef in an ocean

blazeandcave:biomes/in_a_pickle.name: In a Pickle
blazeandcave:biomes/in_a_pickle.requirements: Collect some sea pickles from a coral reef (Obtain sea pickles)
blazeandcave:biomes/in_a_pickle.description: Collect some sea pickles from a coral reef

blazeandcave:biomes/just_a_sample.name: Just a sample
blazeandcave:biomes/just_a_sample.requirements: Collect some coral from a coral reef (Obtain dead or living coral, coral fan or coral block in any color)
blazeandcave:biomes/just_a_sample.actualRequirements: Obtain dead or living coral, coral fan or coral block in any color
blazeandcave:biomes/just_a_sample.description: Collect some coral from a coral reef

blazeandcave:biomes/no_reefing.name: No Reefing!
blazeandcave:biomes/no_reefing.requirements: Collect all colors of coral blocks, coral plants and coral fans (including dead ones) (See requirement notes below)
blazeandcave:biomes/no_reefing.description: Collect all colors of coral blocks, coral plants and coral fans (including dead ones)

blazeandcave:biomes/echolocation.name: Echolocation
blazeandcave:biomes/echolocation.requirements: Feed a dolphin fish to have it lead you to treasure
blazeandcave:biomes/echolocation.description: Feed a dolphin fish to have it lead you to treasure

blazeandcave:biomes/atlantis.name: Atlantis?
blazeandcave:biomes/atlantis.requirements: Explore some Underwater Ruins (Enter an Ocean Ruin)

blazeandcave:biomes/boatception.name: Boatception
blazeandcave:biomes/boatception.requirements: Get in a boat within a shipwreck (Start riding a boat that is inside a shipwreck)
blazeandcave:biomes/boatception.actualRequirements: Start riding a boat that is inside a shipwreck
blazeandcave:biomes/boatception.description: Get in a boat within a shipwreck

blazeandcave:biomes/titanic.name: Titanic
blazeandcave:biomes/titanic.requirements: Find a shipwreck in an iceberg biome (Enter a Shipwreck in a Frozen Ocean or Deep Frozen Ocean biome)
blazeandcave:biomes/titanic.actualRequirements: Enter a Shipwreck in a Frozen Ocean or Deep Frozen Ocean biome
blazeandcave:biomes/titanic.description: Find a shipwreck in an iceberg biome

blazeandcave:biomes/x_marks_the_spot.name: X Marks the Spot
blazeandcave:biomes/x_marks_the_spot.requirements: Use a treasure map to find Buried Treasure (Open a Buried Treasure chest for the first time)
blazeandcave:biomes/x_marks_the_spot.actualRequirements: Open a Buried Treasure chest for the first time
blazeandcave:biomes/x_marks_the_spot.description: Use a treasure map to find Buried Treasure

blazeandcave:biomes/moskstraumen.name: Moskstraumen

blazeandcave:biomes/moskstraumen.description: Construct a Conduit in the ocean

blazeandcave:biomes/kilometre_walk.name: Kilometre Walk
blazeandcave:biomes/kilometre_walk.requirements: Travel at least 1000 blocks from the centre of the world in any direction. It's not that far in real life (Travel beyond 1000 or -1000 in the x or z direction)
blazeandcave:biomes/kilometre_walk.actualRequirements: Travel beyond 1000 or -1000 in the x or z direction
blazeandcave:biomes/kilometre_walk.description: Travel at least 1000 blocks from the centre of the world in any direction. It's not that far in real life

blazeandcave:biomes/ten_thousand_blocks.name: Ten Thousand Blocks
blazeandcave:biomes/ten_thousand_blocks.requirements: Travel at least 10,000 blocks from the centre of the world in any direction. A journey that long begins with a simple step (Travel beyond 10000 or -10000 in the x or z direction)
blazeandcave:biomes/ten_thousand_blocks.actualRequirements: Travel beyond 10000 or -10000 in the x or z direction
blazeandcave:biomes/ten_thousand_blocks.description: Travel at least 10,000 blocks from the centre of the world in any direction. A journey that long begins with a simple step

blazeandcave:biomes/voyage.name: Voyage
blazeandcave:biomes/voyage.requirements: A hundred kilometres! (Travel beyond 100000 or -100000 in the x or z direction)
blazeandcave:biomes/voyage.actualRequirements: Travel beyond 100000 or -100000 in the x or z direction
